note:
I'm Black, queer, crazy, vegan, anarchist, a victim of the French jail system and yet still a daydreamer.

Currently working as a translator/writer.
https://www.talesofka.com/fr

fields.name: Profile picture
fields.value: An anthropomorphic panda with stripes instead of spots, with braided hair, an ear-ring and wearing a hoodie above a pink shirt.

fields.name: Banner
fields.value: A two-panel comic with a rabbit in both. In the second there's text saying "Touching grass isn't enough I need money". The comic was made by Sleepmali in 2023. link: https://sleepimali.tumblr.com/post/717867544103600128/just-me
